meta.title: API3 x LightLink QRNG Hackathon Cheatsheet
meta.description: API3 QRNG is a free-to-use service to provide quantum randomness on-chain. It is powered by Airnode, the serverless first-part oracle that is operated directly by the QRNG API providers.

header.title: Access Quantum Random Numbers with API3 QRNG
header.subtitle: API3 x LightLink Gasless Hackathon

introPara: API3 QRNG is a free-to-use service to provide quantum randomness on-chain. It is powered by Airnode, the serverless first-part oracle that is operated directly by the QRNG API providers.

qrCards.title: Explore
qrCards.description: Start by spending time understanding Quantum Randomness and understanding an overview of how API3 QRNG works.

qrCards.title: QRNG Guides
qrCards.description: If you're a developer looking to get started, follow our simple guide on how to request random numbers to your LightLink smart contracts. These have been designed to take you from 0-1 and action your learning through building your own demo projects.

qrCards.title: Hackathon References
qrCards.description: The API3 Ecosystem has a range of resources available for developers to utilize within hackathons, alongside the API3 guides.

gettingStarted.heading: Hacker getting started list
list: Start by reading the QRNG explore materials
Follow the quickstart guide to call QRNG using the Lightlink ChainID
Explore the QRNG Demo Projects to utilize QRNG in a dApp
Build and utilize QRNG within your hackathon project to win the bounty
